title: 无MOD的服务器可以怎么玩？
author: Chisn
txt_content: 可以做些什么好玩的东西还是干嘛？

replies.author: xcc
replies.txt_content: 躲猫猫/站墙/饥饿游戏等，

replies.author: Chisn
replies.txt_content:
xcc 发表于 2014-6-15 11:20
插件啊孩纸
重点辅助没装游戏插件啊- -

replies.author: BIRDALLIANCE
replies.txt_content: 原版才是游戏的精髓啊

replies.author: xcc
replies.txt_content:
Chisn 发表于 2014-6-15 12:08
